General.Name: Dolly Varden Silver Corporation
General.Description: Dolly Varden Silver Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, lead, zinc, and copper deposits. It holds 100% interests in the Kitsault Valley project, which comprises the Dolly Varden property and the Homestake Ridge property covering an area of 163 square kilometers located in Golden Triangle of British Columbia, Canada; and the Big Bulk property located in Canada. Dolly Varden Silver Corporation was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Three Bentall Centre, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1J1
